history: TTS !b Welcome to CMU Get Going. <break strength='strong'/> Your conversation will be recorded securely in order to help researchers improve voice-based assistants but your phone number will not be shared. <break strength='strong'/> By voluntarily continuing you confirm that you are 18 or older. <break time='1s'/> You are speaking to the BLUE system. Please enter this into the survey immediately <break time='1s' />. </speak>
TTS <speak> How would you like to travel today? <break strength='strong'/> I can give you transit directions or driving directions. </speak>
USER driving
TTS <speak> No problem. <break strength='strong' /> I will give you driving directions to your destination. <break time='800ms'/> </speak>
TTS Where do you wanna go?
USER This Forbes and Craig right now, Pacific Island.
TTS Okay, going to forbes-craig apartments. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS Where do you want to leave from?
USER the airport
TTS Okay, leaving from pittsburgh international airport. <break strength='strong'/>
TTS When do you wanna travel?
USER right now
TTS Okay, travelling at 12:20 pm.
TTS <speak> Just a minute. Let me look up the directions. </speak>
USER yes

TTS There are 2 available routes, to hear a different route say ALTERNATE ROUTE. The amount of time your trip will take is approximately 29 minutes..
Head northeast on Airport Blvd..
Keep left to stay on Airport Blvd..
Slight left to stay on Airport Blvd..
Continue straight to stay on Airport Blvd..
Keep left at the fork, follow signs for I-376 E/I-79 E/Pittsburgh/Pennsylvania Turnpike east and merge onto I-376 east..
Keep right to stay on I-376 east..
Take exit 72A to merge onto Forbes avenue toward Oakland..
Continue straight to stay on Forbes avenue. Destination will be on the left..
TTS <speak> Were the provided directions useful? </speak>
USER Yeah.
TTS <speak> Would you use GetGoing again? </speak>
USER Yeah.
TTS Thank you for using CMU Get Going. If you would like to plan another trip, say <break strength='weak' /> RESTART.
